title: MindDoc: Mental Health Support
description: 🌟 Discover MindDoc: Your Mental Health Companion Embark on your journey towards better mental health with MindDoc. Trusted by over 3 million users worldwide, MindDoc is rated 4.7 stars from 26,000+ reviews, making it the go-to app for mental well-being. 🧠 Developed by Experts in Mental Health Developed by clinical psychologists and researchers, MindDoc is designed to support individuals facing common mental health challenges including depression, anxiety, insomnia, and eating disorders. Track Your Mood and Journal Your Thoughts 📝 Utilize our intuitive mood tracking feature to monitor your emotional state and journal your thoughts, feelings, and experiences. Personalized Insights and Feedback Receive regular feedback on your symptoms, problems and resources as well as a global assessment of your emotional health that you can download and share with your health care provider. A Comprehensive Course Library Based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Receive personalized course recommendations, become an expert for your own mental health and learn and practice actionable strategies for taking charge of your mental health.. Unlock Premium Features with MindDoc Plus Elevate your experience with MindDoc+ and gain unlimited access to our exclusive features with a subscription. Whether you choose a 3-month, 6-month, or 1-year plan, MindDoc+ offers you comprehensive resources and insights to support your mental well-being. 👩‍⚕️ Your Trusted Mental Health Partner MindDoc serves as your dedicated companion on your mental health journey, offering support for various aspects of well-being, including symptom management, coping with painful emotions, stress management, mindfulness, relationships, time management, and self-image. 🔒 Privacy and Support We are committed to your privacy and security. Certified with ISO 27001 and fully GDPR compliant, we prioritize protecting your personal information with the highest standards of security Our robust data security measures ensure that your information is encrypted and securely stored at all times. Rest assured, your privacy is our priority. For assistance or inquiries, reach out to service@minddoc.com.. Learn more about our terms and privacy policy to ensure a safe and secure experience. https://minddoc.com/us/en/terms https://minddoc.com/us/en/self-help/privacy-policy 📋 Regulatory Information MindDoc app is a risk class I medical product according to Annex VIII, Rule 11 of the MDR (REGULATION (EU) 2017/745 on medical devices) Intended medical purpose The MindDoc app allows users to log signs and symptoms of common mental illnesses in real time over long periods of time. The application enables users to self-manage symptoms and related problems by providing evidence-based transdiagnostic courses and exercises to help identify, understand, and manage symptoms through self-initiated behavior change. The application provides users with regular guidance on whether further medical or psychotherapeutic evaluation is indicated through a general feedback on emotional health. The MindDoc app explicitly does not replace a medical or psychotherapeutic assessment or treatment, but can prepare and support the path to psychiatric or psychotherapeutic treatment. ⚕️ Empowering Self-Management Empower yourself with tools and resources for self-management and promoting a proactive approach to mental health care. 📲 Start Your Mental Health Journey Today Take the first step towards taking care of your mental health by downloading MindDoc for free today. Promote your well-being, one step at a time.
descriptionHTML:
🌟 Discover MindDoc: Your Mental Health Companion
Embark on your journey towards better mental health with MindDoc. Trusted by over 3 million users worldwide, MindDoc is rated 4.7 stars from 26,000+ reviews, making it the go-to app for mental well-being.

🧠 Developed by Experts in Mental Health
Developed by clinical psychologists and researchers, MindDoc is designed to support individuals facing common mental health challenges including depression, anxiety, insomnia, and eating disorders.

Track Your Mood and Journal Your Thoughts 📝
Utilize our intuitive mood tracking feature to monitor your emotional state and journal your thoughts, feelings, and experiences.

Personalized Insights and Feedback
Receive regular feedback on your symptoms, problems and resources as well as a global assessment of your emotional health that you can download and share with your health care provider.

A Comprehensive Course Library Based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
Receive personalized course recommendations, become an expert for your own mental health and learn and practice actionable strategies for taking charge of your mental health..

Unlock Premium Features with MindDoc Plus
Elevate your experience with MindDoc+ and gain unlimited access to our exclusive features with a subscription. Whether you choose a 3-month, 6-month, or 1-year plan, MindDoc+ offers you comprehensive resources and insights to support your mental well-being.

👩‍⚕️ Your Trusted Mental Health Partner
MindDoc serves as your dedicated companion on your mental health journey, offering support for various aspects of well-being, including symptom management, coping with painful emotions, stress management, mindfulness, relationships, time management, and self-image.

🔒 Privacy and Support
We are committed to your privacy and security. Certified with ISO 27001 and fully GDPR compliant, we prioritize protecting your personal information with the highest standards of security
Our robust data security measures ensure that your information is encrypted and securely stored at all times.

Rest assured, your privacy is our priority. For assistance or inquiries, reach out to service@minddoc.com.. Learn more about our terms and privacy policy to ensure a safe and secure experience.

https://minddoc.com/us/en/terms
https://minddoc.com/us/en/self-help/privacy-policy

📋 Regulatory Information
MindDoc app is a risk class I medical product according to Annex VIII, Rule 11 of the MDR (REGULATION (EU) 2017/745 on medical devices)

Intended medical purpose

The MindDoc app allows users to log signs and symptoms of common mental illnesses in real time over long periods of time.

The application enables users to self-manage symptoms and related problems by providing evidence-based transdiagnostic courses and exercises to help identify, understand, and manage symptoms through self-initiated behavior change.

The application provides users with regular guidance on whether further medical or psychotherapeutic evaluation is indicated through a general feedback on emotional health.

The MindDoc app explicitly does not replace a medical or psychotherapeutic assessment or treatment, but can prepare and support the path to psychiatric or psychotherapeutic treatment.

⚕️ Empowering Self-Management
Empower yourself with tools and resources for self-management and promoting a proactive approach to mental health care.

📲 Start Your Mental Health Journey Today
Take the first step towards taking care of your mental health by downloading MindDoc for free today. Promote your well-being, one step at a time.
summary: Everyday well-being with mental health courses, insights, mood tracking & more
